title: Audit Maintenance Records
description: A manager needs to audit the maintenance records for a piece of equipment to ensure compliance with the manufacturer's recommendations.

tasks.description: Retrieve the complete maintenance history for a specific asset (e.g., straddle carrier SC-10).
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor pulls all work orders and service records for SC-10 from the maintenance system.

tasks.description: Compare the completed work orders against the OEM's recommended maintenance schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor checks if all required PMs have been completed at the correct intervals.

tasks.description: Identify any missed or overdue maintenance tasks and create a report of the findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit reveals that a scheduled oil change was missed. A report is generated to flag the non-compliance.
